Flag to enable or disable mandatory peer authentication.

Enable or disable peer authentication. Clients default to true, whereas servers default to false.

# sec_protocol_options_set_peer_authentication_required(_:_:) | Apple Developer Documentation

-  sec_protocol_options_set_peer_authentication_required(_:_:) 

Function# sec_protocol_options_set_peer_authentication_required(_:_:)

iOS 12.0+iPadOS 12.0+Mac Catalyst 13.1+macOS 10.14+tvOS 12.0+visionOS 1.0+watchOS 5.0+

```
func sec_protocol_options_set_peer_authentication_required(
    _ options: sec_protocol_options_t,
    _ peer_authentication_required: Bool
)
```

## [ Parameters ](/documentation/Security/sec_protocol_options_set_peer_authentication_required(_:_:)#parameters)

`options`A `sec_protocol_options_t` instance.

`peer_authentication_required`Flag to enable or disable mandatory peer authentication.

## [Discussion](/documentation/Security/sec_protocol_options_set_peer_authentication_required(_:_:)#discussion)

Enable or disable peer authentication. Clients default to true, whereas servers default to false.
